name: UnHax Mode - Base

civilopediaText.text: The main building; it is an "almost one-size-fits-all" building that provides many things such as all stats except Faith, unit XP, and great person points (except Great General and Great Prophet), all in large quantities, as well as some unit promotions that are otherwise exclusive or difficult to obtain, and extra specialist slots. Limited to the capital city only, cannot be sold, and is destroyed when the capital falls.

uniques: May buy [UnHax Mode - Military] buildings for [420000000] [Gold] [in all cities]
May buy [UnHax Mode - Religion] buildings for [420000000] [Gold] [in this city]
May buy [UnHax Mode - Enhancement] buildings for [420000000] [Gold] [in this city]
New [Military] units start with [69000] Experience [in all cities]
Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged
Provides a [UnHax Mode - Military] in your first [4] cities for free
Destroyed when the city is captured
Triggers a global alert upon completion

name: UnHax Mode - Religion

civilopediaText.text: A building made specifically for religion-enabled games, generating Faith at large quantities, and allows for immediate founding and enhancing of religions. It has similar limitations as the main building, with an extra caveat of being unbuildable, but can be bought in the capital city once the main building has been built.

uniques: Gain enough Faith for a Pantheon
May choose [2] additional [Pantheon] beliefs when [founding] a religion
May choose [1] additional [Follower] beliefs when [enhancing] a religion
May choose [1] additional [Enhancer] beliefs when [enhancing] a religion
May not generate great prophet equivalents naturally
May buy [Great Prophet] units for [100] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion] at an increasing price ([50])
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: UnHax Mode - Military

civilopediaText.text: A military-oriented building that provides free unit promotions not provided (or previously provided) by the main building, increased city strength and city health, and others. It has similar limitations as the Religion building, but unlike the first two buildings, it can be built on all cities by buying it with Gold once the main building has been built in the capital.

name: UnHax Mode - Enhancement

civilopediaText.text: A building with assorted bonuses to build on the already plentiful additions provided by Military, Religion, and the main buildings. It shares multiple limitations and mode of acquisition with the Religion building, except for the requirement of the "Enable Religion" option.

uniques: Population loss from nuclear attacks [-200]% [in all cities]
-[100]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]
Maintenance on roads & railroads reduced by [100]%
Tile yields from Natural Wonders doubled
Destroyed when the city is captured
